meeting.title: Hunter-Pack Reverse Engineering Session
meeting.topic: Analyze hunter-pack brilliance and plan WCAG hunter system for NEXUS

context.hunter_pack: Original code intelligence system (shell scripts for Astro/Tailwind)
context.goal: Reverse engineer patterns and create Python-based WCAG hunters
context.target: WCAG 2.1 A/AA/AAA compliance checking for NEXUS-generated sites

questions.question: What makes the hunter-pack architecture brilliant and worth copying?
questions.focus: Pattern recognition, modular design, actionable feedback

questions.question: Should we build WCAG hunters in Python or TypeScript?
questions.focus: HTML parsing, WCAG algorithms, integration with NEXUS

questions.question: Which hunters should we build first for maximum impact?
questions.focus: Color contrast, alt text, heading hierarchy, keyboard nav

questions.question: How should personality AI integrate with hunters?
questions.focus: Analysis of findings, prioritization, fix recommendations

questions.question: Should hunters auto-fix issues or just report them?
questions.focus: Safety vs automation, learning vs doing
